name: Untitled Breakout Game (Altarf)
description:
Short breakout game created in 48h as an entry for #gmtkjam2020.

Made in collaboration with @daniildigtyar.
https://github.com/DaniilDigtyar/GMTK-2020---Team-Pelmeni

We strongly suggest playing in full screen mode, since playing in screened mode has been known to make balls not bounce at the sides properly.
